member.name: P:Axiom.Framework.Properties.Resources.Axiom_Error_Footer
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to If you cannot resolve this issue yourself, please report it through the web site at http://www.axiom3d.net.
If you report the error, please include details of your hardware setup, and attach a copy of the 'axiom.log' file which you will find in the local folder..

member.name: P:Axiom.Framework.Properties.Resources.Axiom_Error_Header
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The Axiom engine has encountered an error from which it cannot recover. The last message was:.

member.name: P:Axiom.Framework.Properties.Resources.Axiom_Error_Title
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Axiom Exception Report.
